channel.title: Neovim on Ojas Tapadia
channel.description: Recent content in Neovim on Ojas Tapadia

item.title: Current Neovim Config
item.description: My current neovim config using kickstart.nvim and lazy.nvim plugin manager can be found here. kickstart.nvim comes preconfigured with every important plugin that is required to make neovim into a fully-functioning-better-than-vscode(in my opinion) ide lazy.nvim is a super cool package manager with lazy loading PS: shoutout to Tj Devries and folke

item.title: First Neovim Config
item.description: My first and my own neovim config using packer.nvim. Super proud of this config!
